languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля разрывает гневный треск.{/n} "Данные приняты к сведению. Вероятность полного успеха не повышена, но увеличена мотивация единицы вернуться к функционированию и исправить богохульство трет... Нет, второй категории!"

{n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля разрывает гневный треск.{/n} "Данные приняты к сведению. Вероятность полного успеха не повышена, но увеличена мотивация единицы вернуться к функционированию и исправить богохульство трет... Нет, второй категории!"

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了怒不可遏的噼啪声。{/n}“已获得新的数据。行动成功的几率并没有提高，但本单位的动机水平已经得到促进。本单位决心纠正第三类亵渎——不，是第二类亵渎恶行！”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置发出了怒不可遏的噼啪声。{/n}“已获得新的数据。行动成功的几率并没有提高，但本单位的动机水平已经得到促进。本单位决心纠正第三类亵渎——不，是第二类亵渎恶行！”

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal restalla con furia.{/n} «Nuevos datos recibidos. La probabilidad de éxito total no ha aumentado, pero sí la motivación de esta unidad para retomar sus funciones y rectificar la blasfemia de categoría dos... ¡no, tres!».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal restalla con furia.{/n} «Nuevos datos recibidos. La probabilidad de éxito total no ha aumentado, pero sí la motivación de esta unidad para retomar sus funciones y rectificar la blasfemia de categoría dos... ¡no, tres!».

languages.text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crépite furieusement.{/n} « Nouvelles données prises en considération. La probabilité d'une réussite totale n'a pas été accrue, mais la motivation de cette unité à reprendre ses activités et à rectifier le blasphème de catégorie trois... non, de catégorie deux, a été renforcée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de Pasqal crépite furieusement.{/n} « Nouvelles données prises en considération. La probabilité d'une réussite totale n'a pas été accrue, mais la motivation de cette unité à reprendre ses activités et à rectifier le blasphème de catégorie trois... non, de catégorie deux, a été renforcée. »

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが怒りに満ちてバリバリと鳴った。{/n}「新たなデータを確認。完全成功の確率は増加していないが、ユニットの作業再開およびカテゴリー3…いや、カテゴリー2の冒涜を是正する動機づけは強化された！」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが怒りに満ちてバリバリと鳴った。{/n}「新たなデータを確認。完全成功の確率は増加していないが、ユニットの作業再開およびカテゴリー3…いや、カテゴリー2の冒涜を是正する動機づけは強化された！」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu öfkeyle çatırdıyor.{/n} "Yeni veri tanımlandı. Tam başarı olasılığı artmadı ama bu birimin performans artırma ve Üçüncü Kategori... Hayır, İkinci Kategori dine aykırılık düzeltmesi motivasyonunda artış gözlendi!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu öfkeyle çatırdıyor.{/n} "Yeni veri tanımlandı. Tam başarı olasılığı artmadı ama bu birimin performans artırma ve Üçüncü Kategori... Hayır, İkinci Kategori dine aykırılık düzeltmesi motivasyonunda artış gözlendi!"

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox knistert wütend:{/n} "Neue Daten bestätigt. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit für einen vollständigen Erfolg hat sich nicht erhöht, aber die Motivation dieser Einheit ist gestiegen, wieder Leistung zu zeigen und die Blasphemie der Kategorie 3 – nein, Kategorie 2 zu ahnden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles in fury.{/n} "New data acknowledged. The probability of complete success has not increased, but there has been a boost to this unit's motivation to resume performance and rectify the Category Three— no, Category Two blasphemy!"
